file.title: Font family

p.text: name of the font , which will be written in the text of the object (Arial, Time new roman).

p.textAll: All possible fonts are described in Auxiliary words -> Fonts .

samples.sample: Options for the 's Style button in the button Window1.Knopa1.Shrift = Arial BlackWindow1.Knopa1.Shrift = "Time"&"new roman" Window1.Knopa1.Shrift = Window1.Knopka2.ShriftWindow1. Knopa1.Shrift = Window1.Tekst1.Tekst
